thread.title: Patricia Kinberg
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by Patricia Kinberg

author: Patricia Kinberg
title: Patricia Kinberg
text:
GREAT customer service and stuck with answering all my questions till I ordered. Stephanie was a great rep and worked with me until we found all the pieces I needed for an antique lamp. It was a great experience working with her and your company.
Sorry to say I did get an email from John and Sue and they said; "sorry to say, we do not have, nor do they make these sockets". But thanks to Stephanie, I got the sockets I needed and the other parts.
